title: Teri Garr
summary: Teri Ann Garr (born December 11, 1944)[1][lower-alpha 1] is a retired American  actress, comedian, dancer, and singer. She frequently appeared in comedic roles throughout her career,[3] which spans four decades and includes over 140 credits in film and television.[4] Her accolades include an Academy Award nomination, a BAFTA Award nomination, and a National Board of Review Award.
